text: Ziguinchor is a region in the south of Senegal. The regional capital is Ziguinchor. As of the 2013 census, 523,840 people lived there. It has an area of . == Départements == There are three départements: * Bignona Département * Oussouye Département * Ziguinchor Département Category:Regions of Senegal
title: Ziguinchor Region
